title: AI Liability Insurance With an Example in AI-Powered E-diagnosis System. (arXiv:2306.01149v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has received an increasing amount of attention in multiple areas. The uncertainties and risks in AI-powered systems have created reluctance in their wild adoption. As an economic solution to compensate for potential damages, AI liability insurance is a promising market to enhance the integration of AI into daily life. In this work, we use an AI-powered E-diagnosis system as an example to study AI liability insurance. We provide a quantitative risk assessment model with evidence-based numerical analysis. We discuss the insurability criteria for AI technologies and suggest necessary adjustments to accommodate the features of AI products. We show that AI liability insurance can act as a regulatory mechanism to incentivize compliant behaviors and serve as a certificate of high-quality AI systems. translated_title: 人工智能责任保险：以AI辅助电子诊断系统为例
translated_abstract: 人工智能在许多领域受到越来越多的关注。由于AI-powered系统中的不确定性和风险，在野外运用中引起了犹豫。作为一种经济解决方案来弥补潜在损害，AI责任保险是一个有前途的市场，可以增强AI对日常生活的整合。本文以一个AI辅助的电子诊断系统为例，研究AI责任保险。我们提供了一个定量风险评估模型，并进行了基于证据的数值分析。我们讨论了AI技术的可保险性标准，并建议必要的调整来适应AI产品的特点。我们表明，AI责任保险可以作为一种监管机制来激励合规行为，并作为高质量AI系统的证书。此外，我们建议调整保费以反映AI内在不确定性的动态演变。讨论了道德风险问题，并提出了对AI产品进行的建议。
tldr: 本文章研究了AI责任保险，并以AI辅助的电子诊断系统为例进行了定量风险评估。AI责任保险可以作为监管机制来激励合规行为，并为高质量AI系统提供证书。
en_tdlr: This paper studies AI liability insurance, provides quantitative risk assessment with an AI-powered e-diagnosis system example, and suggests it as a regulatory mechanism to incentivize compliant behaviors and certify high-quality AI systems.
